channel.title: solidarity on Zinzy's website
channel.description: Recent content in solidarity on Zinzy's website

item.title: The artificial borders of climate activism
item.description: Yesterday at the Climate March, someone shouted “From the river to the sea, Palestine will be free”. It was an unfortunate thing. A clean example of the climate changing instantaneously among 85,000 activists. I was there for four reasons: My definition of God is “science is indescribably beautiful and we must respect her” I can’t think of a more regrettable waste of tax money than having to spend it on health issues we can prevent if only we take better care of our environment I have a weak spot for an activist friend, who, through stealth influencing, had instilled in me a deep sense of FOMO about the event The Dutch carnival season had kicked off on November 11, and I was in the mood for a parade The phrase was understandable coming from the Palestinian woman.
